Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 20 Feb 2019Hi,The more common valaution ratio are Price to Earning, Price to Cash flow, Enterprise value to Earning before Interest and Tax (EBIT) and Price to Boook. 0 comments0
